courses.title: Communication (Core)
courses.prerequisite: For all 010 courses: Satisfactory scores on English portion of ACT test and TSI examination or ENGL 0301. For ENGL 1302, a grade of 'C' or better in ENGL 1301.
courses.notes: See Core Curriculum for details. Option: ENGL 1301

courses.title: Calculus I
courses.prerequisite: MATH 2412 with a grade of 'C' or better; or passing the Precalculus Exemption Test administered by the Department of Mathematics.

courses.title: Introduction to Programming C++
courses.prerequisite: Concurrent enrollment or credit for MATH 1314 or higher level mathematics course.

courses.title: Learning Framework
courses.notes: As required, based on credit hours earned, TSI status, High School rank, major declaration.

courses.title: Calculus II
courses.prerequisite: MATH 2413 (or MATH 2487) with a grade of 'C' or better.

courses.title: Mathematics for Electrical and Computer Engineers
courses.prerequisite: CSCI 1381 or CMPE 1170/1370 (or CMPE 1378/1178) or CSCI 1470 with a grade of 'C' or better, and MATH 2413 (or MATH 2487) with a grade of 'C' or better.

courses.title: Physics for Scientists and Engineers I
courses.prerequisite: MATH 2413.

courses.title: Digital Systems Engineering I
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better or registration in CMPE 1101 or ELEE 1101 or CSCI 1101 or EECE 1101.

courses.title: Digital Systems Engineering I Lab
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better or registration in [CMPE 2330 or ELEE 2330 or EECE 2306].

courses.title: Communication (Core)
courses.prerequisite: For all 010 courses: Satisfactory scores on English portion of ACT test and TSI examination or ENGL 0301. For ENGL 1302, a grade of 'C' or better in ENGL 1301.

courses.title: Creative Arts (Core)
courses.notes: See Core Curriculum for course options.

courses.title: Physics for Scientists and Engineers II
courses.prerequisite: PHYS 2425 and MATH 2414.

courses.title: Electric Circuits I
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in MATH 2414 and [CMPE 1101 or ELEE 1101 or EECE 1101] and a grade of C or better or registration in PHYS 2426.

courses.title: Electric Circuits I Lab
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better or registration in [CMPE 2320 or ELEE 2305 or EECE 2305].

courses.title: Numerical Computation and Data Visualization
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in CSCI 1381 and a grade of C or better or registration in MATH 2346.

courses.title: Calculus III
courses.prerequisite: MATH 2414 (or MATH 2488) with a grade of 'C' or better.

courses.title: Chemistry for Engineers or General Chemistry I
courses.prerequisite: Minimum grade of C is required in one of the following courses: MATH 1314, MATH 1414, MATH 2412, MATH 2413 or MATH 2487.

courses.title: Signals and Systems
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [CMPE 2320 or ELEE 2305 or EECE 2305] and a grade of C or better or registration in MATH 3341.

courses.title: Electronics I
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [CMPE 2320 or ELEE 2305 or EECE 2305] and [CMPE 2120 or ELEE 2105 or EECE 2105]

courses.title: Electronics I Lab
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [CMPE 2320 or ELEE 2305 or EECE 2305] and [CMPE 2120 or ELEE 2105 or EECE 2105] and a grade of C or better or registration in [EECE 3301 or ELEE 3301].

courses.title: Electromagnetics Engineering
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [EECE 2305 or ELEE 2305], MATH 2415 and PHYS 2426.

courses.title: Microprocessor Systems
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [ELEE 2330 or CMPE 2330 or EECE 2306] and [CSCI 1370 or CSCI 1381 or CSCI 1470].

courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [ELEE 2330 or CMPE 2330 or EECE 2306].

courses.title: Electrical Engineering Lab II

courses.title: Automatic Controls
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [EECE 3321 or ELEE 3321] and MATH 3341.

courses.title: Solid State Devices
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [EECE 3301 or ELEE 3301].

courses.title: Communication Theory
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [EECE 3340 or ELEE 3340] and [EECE 3321 or ELEE 3321].

courses.title: Senior Design I
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [ELEE 3435 or CMPE 3437 or EECE 3435 or CSCI 2333 or CMPE 2333] and [CMPE 3403 or ELEE 3301 or EECE 3301] and [STAT 3337 or CMPE 3343 or ELEE 3340 or EECE 3340 or EECE 3230 or ELEE 3230] and [CMPE 3340 or CSCI 3340 or EECE 3230 or ELEE 3230] and [having finished with a grade of C or better or be enrolled in at least 6 credits of 4000-level EECE coursework].

courses.title: Prescribed Elective
courses.prerequisite: Must be an approved 3000- or 4000-level EECE Prescribed Elective Course.
courses.notes: See program of study for approved list.

courses.title: Senior Design II
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [EECE 4361 or ELEE 4361] or CMPE 4371 or CMPE 4373.

courses.title: Integrative/Experiential Learning Option (Core)
courses.notes: Complete three credit hours from the approved area, except PHIL 2326, in addition to CSCI 1380.
